name: kristofvc/contact
description: This is a component that defines a contact page

suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: If you want to integrate with slack you could use guzzle to send your data to slack
suggest.excelwebzone/recaptcha-bundle: Install this bundle if you want a recaptcha in your contact form
suggest.symfony/validator: Install the symfony validation component if you want validation of your contact model class
suggest.symfony/translation: Add the symfony translator if you want to make the flash message translatable
suggest.doctrine/orm: Install Doctrine ORM to persist your contact form in a relational database
suggest.swiftmailer/swiftmailer: Use this component if you want to send mails about who contacted you
